* Brand: MSI
* Model: S260
* Website: http://www.msi.com.tw/program/products/notebook/nb/pro_nb_selling.php?UID=607

=== Current Issues ===

* Hibernation takes almost 10 minutes to successfully finish. (#33612)

* Doesn't wake up if left in suspend mode for a longer time (few hours)

* If somehow wakes up after few hours of suspend, cpu fun blows at full speed and doesn't turn off. (#37132)
